bonusActions.text: The worg teleports, along with a willing creature of its choice within 5 feet of it, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Exalted Restoration
traits.text: If the deva dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The deva has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

multiAttack.text: The deva makes two Holy Mace attacks.

attacks.name: Holy Mace
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) Radiant damage.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The deva casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17): At will: Detect Evil and Good, Shapechange (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell) 1/day each: Commune, Raise Dead

bonusActions.name: Divine Aid (2/Day)
bonusActions.text: The deva casts Cure Wounds, Lesser Restoration, or Remove Curse, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. 2 times per day: Cure Wounds, Lesser Restoration, Remove Curse

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The deva casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):

will: Shapechange (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell)

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The slaad has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The slaad regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

multiAttack.text: The slaad makes two Chaos Blade attacks.

attacks.name: Chaos Blade
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 10 ft. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. Until the start of the slaad's next turn, the target has a condition determined by rolling 1d4: on a 1, Charmed; on a 2, Frightened; on a 3, Poisoned; or on a 4, Incapacitated.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The slaad casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16): At will: Detect Magic, Detect Thoughts, Invisibility (self only), Mage Hand, Major Image 1/day each: Blight (level 8 version), Cloudkill (level 6 version), Fly, Plane Shift, Tongues

bonusActions.name: Shape-Shift
bonusActions.text: The slaad shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The slaad casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

traits.name: Lightning Blood
traits.text: A creature within 5 feet of the death kiss takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage whenever it hits the death kiss with a melee attack that deals piercing or slashing damage.

multiAttack.text: The death kiss makes three Tentacle attacks. Up to three of these attacks can be replaced by Blood Drain—one replacement per tentacle grappling a creature.

attacks.name: Tentacle
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Huge or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the death kiss can't use the same tentacle on another target. The death kiss has ten tentacles.

special.name: Blood Drain
special.text: One creature grappled by a tentacle of the death kiss must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 (4d10) lightning damage, and the death kiss regains half as many hit points.

traits.name: Shadowy Form
traits.text: While the darkweaver is in dim light or darkness, attack rolls against it are made with disadvantage unless the darkweaver has the incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The darkweaver can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
traits.text: The darkweaver takes 10 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

multiAttack.text: The darkweaver makes two Shadow Web attacks and one Bite attack. It can use Reel after any of these attacks.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, the target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

attacks.name: Shadow Web
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 16 (3d10) necrotic damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 15). The shadow web can be attacked and destroyed (AC 16; 20 hit points; vulnerability to radiant damage; immunity to bludgeoning, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage). The darkweaver can grapple up to six creatures at a time using its shadow web.

special.name: Reel
special.text: The darkweaver pulls each creature it has grappled up to 60 feet toward itself.

traits.name: Pact of Pain
traits.text: Using a 10-minute ritual, the daemogoth can forge a magical bond with a willing creature it touches throughout the ritual. The creature becomes bound by the pact until it dies, the daemogoth dies, or the pact is broken by any effect that can remove a curse.

multiAttack.text: The daemogoth makes three Agonizing Burst attacks. It can use Terrify, if available, in place of one of the attacks.

attacks.name: Agonizing Burst
attacks.text: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d10) force damage. If the target is a creature, the daemogoth regains 5 hit points.

special.name: Terrify
special.text: The daemogoth targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 33 (6d10) psychic damage and is frightened of the daemogoth until the end of the daemogoth's next turn, and the daemogoth regains 5 hit points. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't frightened, and the daemogoth doesn't heal.

traits.name: One-Eyed
traits.text: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

traits.name: Storm Wings
traits.text: While outdoors in stormy conditions, the cyclops has a flying speed of 60 feet.

traits.name: Supernatural Focus
traits.text: The cyclops has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on spells, and cannot lose concentration because of turbulent weather.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.text: The cyclops's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The cyclops can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: ray of frost (3d8), water walk 3/day each: ice storm, sleet storm, wind wall 1/day each: control weather, storm of vengeance

multiAttack.text: The cyclops makes two ice claw attacks.

attacks.name: Ice Claw
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cyclops's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The cyclops can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

multiAttack.text: The cyclops makes three attacks, using Radiant Strike or Flash of Light in any combination.

attacks.name: Radiant Strike
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) Radiant damage.

attacks.name: Flash of Light
attacks.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +10, range 120 ft. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) Radiant damage, and the target has Disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of the cyclops's next turn.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The cyclops casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16): once per day: Legend Lore 2/day each: Arcane Eye, Detect Magic, Locate Object

reactions.name: Portent
reactions.text: Trigger: The cyclops or an ally it can see makes a D20 Test. The cyclops rolls 1d20 and chooses whether to use that roll in place of the d20 rolled for the D20 Test.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cyclops casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

multiAttack.text: The cultist makes three attacks, using Pact Blade or Radiant Ray in any combination.

attacks.name: Pact Blade
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) Radiant damage.

attacks.name: Radiant Ray
attacks.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +9, range 120 ft. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 5) Radiant damage.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17): At will: Thaumaturgy 1/day each: Jallarzi's Storm of Radiance (level 7 version), Mass Suggestion

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The cultist casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):

name: Crystal Golem
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

immunities.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: The golem magically sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. This light goes out when the golem is destroyed.

traits.name: Light Intensity
traits.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the illuminated golem and can see the golem must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded until the start of the creature's next turn.

multiAttack.text: The golem makes two slam attacks.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

special.name: Slow
special.text: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

name: Clockwork Kraken
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The clockwork kraken has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Independent Tentacles
traits.text: The clockwork kraken has eight tentacles, each of which is treated as a Medium creature, moves independently on the construct's turn, and has a flying speed of 40 feet. The clockwork kraken's senses operate through its tentacles as well as its main body. Each tentacle can be attacked independently, with damage dealt to tentacles applied to the clockwork kraken's hit point total. A tentacle is destroyed if it takes more than 20 damage.

multiAttack.text: The clockwork kraken makes four tentacle slam attacks.

attacks.name: Tentacle Slam
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Avoidance
traits.text: If the mutate is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.text: While in bright light, the mutate has disadvantage on attack rolls.

multiAttack.text: The mutate makes one Corpse Swipe attack and two Tail attacks, or it makes four Tail attacks.

attacks.name: Corpse Swipe
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, a creature can't regain hit points.

attacks.name: Tail
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

bonusActions.name: Phantasmal Duplicates
bonusActions.text: The mutate magically projects up to four illusory copies of itself. These duplicates make it difficult to ascertain the mutate's true location and last until the end of the mutate's next turn. While the copies exist, attack rolls against the mutate are made with disadvantage.

bonusActions.name: Psychic Moan
bonusActions.text: The mutate lets out a moan charged with psychic energy. Each creature within 60 feet of the mutate that isn't an Aberration must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or take 17 (5d6) psychic damage and have the frightened condition until the end of the mutate's next turn.

traits.name: Bolts of Undead Slaying
traits.text: Borivik has a half-dozen bolts of undead slaying. If he strikes an Undead creature with one of these magic bolts, it must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking an extra 33 (6d10) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much extra damage on a successful one.

multiAttack.text: Borivik makes two Shortsword attacks or two Heavy Crossbow attacks.

attacks.name: Shortsword
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

attacks.name: Heavy Crossbow
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, ranged 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: Borivik casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): At will: ensnaring strike, speak with animals 2/day each: cordon of arrows, daylight, lesser restoration, nondetection

bonusActions.name: Crossbow Expert
bonusActions.text: Borivik adds 1d10 to his next attack or damage roll with his Heavy Crossbow attack.

bonusActions.name: Nimble Escape
bonusActions.text: Borivik can take the Disengage or Hide action.

reactions.name: Enduring Response
reactions.text: When Borivik takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, he gains immunity to that damage type until the start of his next turn. Also, the first time he hits with a Shortsword attack on his next turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) of the triggering damage type.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Borivik casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

traits.name: Bolstering Presence
traits.text: The biomancer magically emanates life-giving energy within 30 feet of itself. Any ally of the biomancer that starts its turn there regains 5 (1d10) hit points.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The biomancer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.text: The biomancer is a 16th-level Simic spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The biomancer has the following wizard spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): acid splash, light, mending, poison spray, shocking grasp 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, grease, shield 2nd level (3 slots): alter self, darkvision, enlarge/reduce, hold person 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, dispel magic, haste, protection from energy 4th level (3 slots): confusion, conjure minor elementals, polymorph 5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, creation, hold monster 6th level (1 slots): move earth, wall of ice 7th level (1 slots): prismatic spray 8th level (1 slots): control weather

attacks.name: Scimitar
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The biomancer is a 16th-level Simic spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The biomancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

traits.name: Enchanting Presence
traits.text: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

multiAttack.text: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

attacks.name: Longsword
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

attacks.name: Longbow
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16): At will: hold person 2/day each: cure wounds (as a 5th-level spell), lesser restoration 1/day each: greater restoration, revivify

bonusActions.name: Fey Step
bonusActions.text: The eladrin teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Foster Peace
reactions.text: If a creature charmed by the eladrin hits with an attack roll while within 60 feet of the eladrin, the eladrin magically causes the attack to miss, provided the eladrin can see the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

immunities.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

traits.name: Infernal Tracker
traits.text: Aribeth knows the distance to and direction of any creature that has broken a pact with Mephistopheles, even if the creature and Aribeth are on different planes of existence.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Aribeth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Nightmare
traits.text: Aribeth is accompanied by a nightmare. The nightmare allows Aribeth to use it as a mount.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: Aribeth regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn. If Aribeth takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Aribeth's next turn. Aribeth's body is destroyed only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Shadows
traits.text: Three shadows hide within the saddle of Aribeth's nightmare. These shadows only come out if there is a creature within 30 feet that is at 0 hit points. When that happens, a shadow emerges and attacks the creature in order to make it fail a death saving throw. It continues to do so until the creature is dead.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, Aribeth has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

multiAttack.text: Aribeth makes three Void or Unholy Strike attacks.

attacks.name: Void
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points from damage dealt by the sword Void dies and can't be revived by any means short of a wish spell.

attacks.name: Unholy Strike
attacks.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) necrotic damage.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: Aribeth casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): once per day: dispel magic 2/day each: aid, command, magic weapon, searing smite, shield of faith

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.text: Aribeth adds 4 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, Aribeth must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Aribeth casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.text: The archon's weapon attacks are magical. When the archon hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.text: The archon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its understanding of justice.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: One Being
traits.text: Though it appears as a humanoid creature riding a mount, an archon is a single being. The "rider" can't be dismounted, and no other means can separate the two portions of the archon's being short of its death.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.text: The archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components: At will: detect evil and good 1/day each: destructive wave, geas

multiAttack.text: The archon makes two attacks: one with its sword and one with its claws.

attacks.name: Sword
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

attacks.name: Claws
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

name: Animated Furniture
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

immunities.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.text: The animated furniture is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The animated furniture has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The animated furniture's weapon attacks are magical.

multiAttack.text: The animated furniture makes two slam attacks.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

special.name: Slow
special.text: The animated furniture targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.text: The angel's weapon attacks are magical. When the angel hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 4d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.text: The angel's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The angel can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components: At will: detect evil and good 1/day each: commune, raise dead

multiAttack.text: The angel makes two melee attacks.

attacks.name: Staff
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the angel can't attack another target with its staff.

special.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
special.text: The angel touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 (4d8 + 2) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

special.name: Change Shape
special.text: The angel magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the angel's choice). In a new form, the angel retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

traits.text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

multiAttack.text: The golem makes two slam attacks.

special.name: Slow
special.text: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

multiAttack.text: The golem makes two slam attacks.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

special.name: Ruidium Dart
special.text: The golem can conjure a magic dart made of ruidium and hurl it at another creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The dart strikes the target unerringly and vanishes on contact. The target must make a DC 17 Charisma saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target takes 24 (7d6) psychic damage and gains 1 level of exhaustion. In addition, if the target is not already suffering from ruidium corruption, it becomes corrupted when it fails the saving throw. On a successful saving throw, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

special.name: Slow
special.text: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.text: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns Undead.

multiAttack.text: The alhoon makes two Chilling Grasp or Arcane Bolt attacks.

attacks.name: Chilling Grasp
attacks.text: Melee Spell Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) cold damage, and the alhoon regains 14 hit points.

attacks.name: Arcane Bolt
attacks.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (8d6) force damage.

special.name: Mind Blast
special.text: The alhoon magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The alhoon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16): At will: dancing lights, detect magic, detect thoughts, disguise self, mage hand, prestidigitation 1/day each: dominate monster, globe of invulnerability, invisibility, modify memory, plane shift (self only), wall of force

reactions.name: Negate Spell (3/Day)
reactions.text: The alhoon targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it that is casting a spell. If the spell is 3rd level or lower, the spell fails, but any spell slots or charges are not wasted.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The alhoon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

resistances.condition: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the kocrachon's darkvision.

traits.name: Infernal Rot
traits.text: A creature afflicted with this disease has the poisoned condition until the disease ends. While diseased, creatures gain no benefits from a long rest, gaining exhaustion when necessary. If a creature dies while afflicted with Infernal Rot, its corpse transforms into a newborn kocrachon after 4 (1d8) days.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The kocrachon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sadism
traits.text: The kocrachon gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls for each different creature it damaged on its previous turn.

multiAttack.text: The kocrachon makes three Claw attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a Proboscis attack.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

attacks.name: Proboscis
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage. Creatures damaged by this attack must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or suffer the Infernal Rot disease.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The aerosaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

multiAttack.text: The aerosaur makes one Bite attack and one Talons attack.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (3d12 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition, and the aerosaur can't Bite another target.

attacks.name: Talons
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage.

special.name: Wing Gusts
special.text: The aerosaur beats its wings, creating bursts of thunderous force. Each creature within 10 feet of the aerosaur must make a DC 20 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (7d10) thunder damage, is pushed up to 30 feet horizontally from the aerosaur, and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is pushed up to 15 feet horizontally from the aerosaur.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The absorber has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.text: If the absorber moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits its claws attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the absorber can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

multiAttack.text: The absorber makes three attacks: one with its bite or Mind Bolt and two with its claws.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) force damage.

attacks.name: Claws
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

attacks.name: Mind Bolt
attacks.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 22 (4d10) psychic damage.

reactions.name: Tail Ray

components.target: Dexterity saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the caster takes the other half of the damage

reactions.text: When the absorber takes damage from a spell, the absorber takes only half the triggering damage. If the spellcaster is within 60 feet of the absorber, the absorber can force the caster to make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the caster takes the other half of the damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Eldritch Restoration
traits.text: If destroyed, the aboleth gains a new body in 5d10 days, reviving with all its Hit Points in the Far Realm or another location chosen by the DM.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.text: If the aboleth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Mucus Cloud
traits.text: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by mucus. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the aboleth at the end of the aboleth's turn. Failure: The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target's skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can't regain Hit Points unless it is underwater.

traits.name: Probing Telepathy
traits.text: If a creature the aboleth can see communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires.

multiAttack.text: The aboleth makes two Tentacle attacks and uses either Consume Memories or Dominate Mind if available.

attacks.name: Tentacle
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 15 ft. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of four tentacles.

special.name: Consume Memories
special.text: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature within 30 feet that is Charmed or Grappled by the aboleth. Failure: 10 (3d6) Psychic damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: The aboleth gains the target's memories if the target is a Humanoid and is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this action.

special.name: Dominate Mind (2/Day)
special.text: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature the aboleth can see within 30 feet. Failure: The target has the Charmed condition until the aboleth dies or is on a different plane of existence from the target. While Charmed, the target acts as an ally to the aboleth and is under its control while within 60 feet of it. In addition, the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance. The target repeats the save whenever it takes damage as well as after every 24 hours it spends at least 1 mile away from the aboleth, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Lash
actions.text: The aboleth makes one Tentacle attack.

actions.name: Psychic Drain
actions.text: If the aboleth has at least one creature Charmed or Grappled, it uses Consume Memories and regains 5 (1d10) Hit Points.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.text: The dragon doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The dragon doesn't require air.

multiAttack.text: The dragon makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) radiant damage.

attacks.name: Tail
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

special.name: Photonic Breath
special.text: The dragon exhales a flashing mote of radiant energy that travels to a point the dragon can see within 120 feet of itself, then blossoms into a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each creature in the sphere must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

multiAttack.text: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Paralyzing Breath.

attacks.name: Rend
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Slashing damage.

special.name: Cold Breath
special.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: 49 (11d8) Cold damage. Success: Half damage.

special.name: Paralyzing Breath
special.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. First Failure: The target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save. Second Failure: The target has the Paralyzed condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The dragon can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.text: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and can leave a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

multiAttack.text: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) thunder damage.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage.

special.name: Debilitating Breath
special.text: The dragon exhales a pulse of high-pitched, nearly inaudible sound in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 33 (6d10) thunder damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated.

special.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
special.text: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): 1/day each: dissonant whispers, hold person, meld into stone

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

traits.name: Searing Presence
traits.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the landshark takes 11 (2d10) fire damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.text: The landshark's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: The landshark sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 5) piercing damage, and 14 (4d6) fire damage.

special.name: Deadly Leap
special.text: If the landshark jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a DC 16 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked prone and take 19 (4d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed 5 feet out of the landshark's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls prone in the land-shark's space.

multiAttack.text: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

attacks.name: Rend
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 10 ft. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) Lightning damage.

special.name: Lightning Breath
special.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. Failure: 55 (10d10) Lightning damage. Success: Half damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The dragon can breathe both air and water.

multiAttack.text: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) force damage.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

special.name: Singularity Breath
special.text: The dragon creates a shining bead of gravitational force in its mouth, then releases the energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 (8d8) force damage, and its speed becomes 0 until the start of the dragon's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and its speed isn't reduced.

special.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
special.text: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16): 1/day each: blink, dispel magic, protection from evil and good, sending

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

traits.name: Blood Aegis
traits.text: The AC of Y'demi includes her Constitution modifier while she isn't wearing armor or wielding a shield.

traits.name: Oriq Mask
traits.text: Y'demi wears an Oriq mask. While wearing the mask, Y'demi can't be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors, and she adds double her proficiency bonus to Charisma (Deception) checks (included above).

traits.name: Sanguine Sense
traits.text: While Y'demi isn't blinded, she can see any creature that isn't an Undead or a Construct within 60 feet of itself, even through total cover, heavily obscured areas, invisibility, or any other phenomena that would prevent sight.

multiAttack.text: Y'demi makes two Blood Lash attacks.

attacks.name: Blood Lash
attacks.text: Melee Spell Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the Y'demi's next turn.

special.name: Blood Boil
special.text: Y'demi chooses a point within 150 feet of itself, and a 20-foot radius sphere centered on that point fills with a burst of searing, blood-red mist. Each creature of Y'demi's choice that she can see in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (7d10) necrotic damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated. A creature dies if reduced to 0 hit points by this necrotic damage.

bonusActions.name: Sanguine Tentacles (1/Day)
bonusActions.text: The blood in the copper basin disappears as tentacles of congealed blood fill a 10-foot cube centered at a point on the ground that Y'demi can see within 15 feet of her. The effect lasts for 1 minute, during which time that area is difficult terrain. Any creature entering that area for the first time on a turn or starting its turn there must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained by the tentacles. A creature that starts its turn restrained by the tentacles takes 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage. A creature restrained by the tentacles can use its action to make either a DC 13 Strength (Athletics) check or a DC 13 Dexterity (Acrobatics) check, ending the restrained condition on itself on a success.

traits.name: Blurred Form
traits.text: Attack rolls against the whistler are made with disadvantage unless the whistler is incapacitated.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The whistler doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

multiAttack.text: The whistler makes three Psychic Swipe attacks.

attacks.name: Psychic Swipe
attacks.text: Melee Spell Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage.

special.name: Otherworldly Melody
special.text: The whistler telepathically whistles an otherworldly melody into the minds of up to two creatures it can see within range of its telepathy. Each target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or take 33 (6d10) psychic damage and become frightened of the whistler for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonusActions.name: Surreal Step
bonusActions.text: The whistler teleports up to 20 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

multiAttack.text: The war priest makes two Maul attacks, and it uses Holy Fire.

attacks.name: Maul
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus Hit: 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

special.name: Holy Fire
special.text: The war priest targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 12 (2d8 + 3) radiant damage, and it is blinded until the start of the war priest's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't blinded.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The war priest casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): At will: light, spare the dying, thaumaturgy 1/day each: banishment, command, dispel magic, flame strike, guardian of faith, hold person, lesser restoration, revivify

bonusActions.name: Healing Light
bonusActions.text: The war priest or one creature of its choice within 60 feet of it regains 12 (2d8 + 3) hit points.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The war priest casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

traits.name: Brave
traits.text: Viktor has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Shadow Dragon Companion
traits.text: Viktor has a young gold shadow dragon that accompanies him at all times. If Viktor dies, the young gold shadow dragon returns to the Shadowfell.

traits.name: Sun Blade
traits.text: Viktor wields a sun blade. Viktor gains a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon, which deals radiant damage instead of slashing damage (this is already factored into Viktor's stat block). When Viktor hits an Undead creature with this sword, that target takes an extra 4 (1d8) radiant damage. The sword's luminous blade emits bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The light is sunlight.

multiAttack.text: Viktor makes two Sun Blade attacks and one Raven's Whisper attack.

attacks.name: Sun Blade
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) radiant damage or 11 (1d10 + 6) radiant damage if used with two hands.

attacks.name: Raven's Whisper
attacks.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d10 + 3) radiant damage.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: Viktor casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): At will: bless, shield of faith, thunderous smite 2/day each: aid, branding smite, lesser restoration 1/day each: banishment, blinding smite, death ward, revivify

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Viktor casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

traits.name: Animal Companions
traits.text: Vellin is accompanied by Akela (wolf with 18 hit points). Vellin can mount or dismount Akela using 5 feet of movement. While mounted, Vellin can order Akela to Dash, Disengage, and Dodge. In addition, Vellin has an owl companion with 3 hit points. On Vellin's turn, the owl can perform a flyby on a creature of Vellin's choice. The next attack that Vellin makes against that creature has advantage.

traits.name: Brave
traits.text: Vellin has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Fiend Slayer
traits.text: When Vellin hits a Fiend with a weapon attack he deals an additional 7 (2d6) radiant damage.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.text: Vellin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Vellin wields a +1 shortsword (silvered) and a +1 shield.

multiAttack.text: Vellin makes three Silvered Shortsword attacks.

attacks.name: Silvered Shortsword
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Nimble Escape
bonusActions.text: Vellin can take the Disengage or Hide action.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Valygar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Mage Slaying
traits.text: When Valygar deals damage to a creature that is concentrating on a spell, that creature has disadvantage on the saving throw it makes to maintain its concentration.

multiAttack.text: Valygar makes two Katana attacks and one Hand Crossbow attack or he makes two Hand Crossbow attacks.

attacks.name: Katana
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands plus 13 (3d8) poison damage.

attacks.name: Hand Crossbow
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

bonusActions.name: Shadow Stealth
bonusActions.text: While in dim light or darkness, Valygar can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

reactions.name: Disrupt Spell
reactions.text: When a creature within 5 feet of Valygar casts a spell, he can use his reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The tree deals double damage to objects and structures.

multiAttack.text: The tree makes two slam attacks.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

attacks.name: Rock
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

special.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
special.text: The tree magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the tree. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the tree dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the tree takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

traits.name: Creature Sense
traits.text: The ulitharid is aware of the presence of creatures within 2 miles of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The ulitharid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Psionic Hub
traits.text: If an elder brain establishes a psychic link with the ulitharid, the elder brain can form a psychic link with any other creature the ulitharid can detect using its Creature Sense. Any such link ends if the creature falls outside the telepathy ranges of both the ulitharid and the elder brain. The ulitharid can maintain its psychic link with the elder brain regardless of the distance between them, so long as they are both on the same plane of existence. If the ulitharid is more than 5 miles away from the elder brain, it can end the psychic link at any time (no action required).

attacks.name: Tentacles
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 14) and must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

attacks.name: Extract Brain
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated Humanoid grappled by the ulitharid. Hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ulitharid kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

special.name: Mind Blast
special.text: The ulitharid magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or take 31 (4d12 + 5) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

special.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
special.text: The ulitharid casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17): At will: detect thoughts, levitate 1/day each: dominate monster, feeblemind, mass suggestion, plane shift (self only), project image, scrying, telekinesis

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The ulitharid casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.text: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: detect magic, fog cloud, light 3/day each: feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis 1/day each: control weather, gaseous form

multiAttack.text: The giant makes two morningstar attacks.

attacks.name: Morningstar
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.

attacks.name: Rock
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the treant totem remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The treant totem deals double damage to objects and structures.

multiAttack.text: The treant totem makes two slam attacks.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

attacks.name: Rock
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

special.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
special.text: The treant totem magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant totem. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the treant totem dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the treant totem takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

multiAttack.text: The treant makes two Slam attacks.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 5 ft. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

attacks.name: Hail of Bark
attacks.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +10, range 180 ft. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) Piercing damage.

special.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
special.text: The treant magically animates up to two trees it can see within 60 feet of itself. Each tree uses the Treant stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, it can't speak, and it lacks this action. The tree takes its turn immediately after the treant on the same Initiative count, and it obeys the treant. A tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, the treant dies, or it is more than 120 feet from the treant. The tree then takes root if possible.

traits.name: Brave
traits.text: Tiberius Inuus has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

multiAttack.text: Tiberius Inuus makes three Flame Tongue attacks.

attacks.name: Flame Tongue
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

attacks.name: Heavy Crossbow
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

special.name: Touch of Sune
special.text: Tiberius Inuus touches a creature. The target magically regains 40 hit points and is freed from any disease or poison.

reactions.name: Vengeance
reactions.text: When Tiberius Inuus is hit by an attack he can utter an oath of vengeance against the creature that made the attack. He gains advantage on attack rolls against that creature for 1 minute or until it drops to 0 hit points or falls unconscious.

traits.name: Alchemical Defense
traits.text: Tary's experimental concoctions have granted him resistance to acid and poison damage, and immunity to the poisoned condition.

traits.name: Doty
traits.text: Doty moves and acts on Tary's turn, and Tary can use a bonus action to command him to use the Dash, Dodge, Disengage, or Attack action. He can also command him to Attack as part of his Multitask action (see below). Doty can take only one action on each of Tary's turns.

traits.name: Focused
traits.text: Tary has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on spells.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Tary wears a helm of brilliance, a robe of useful items, and a ring of the ram. He carries a rod of mercurial form, as well as a bag of holding, 1d4 + 4 bead of force, a broom of flying, and a chime of opening.

traits.name: Toughness
traits.text: Tary has an additional 30 hit points.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.text: Tary is a 15th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): mending, prestidigitation, ray of frost (3d8) 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, heroism, identify, shield 2nd level (3 slots): alter self, branding smite, see invisibility, warding bond 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, fly, haste, magic circle, revivify 4th level (2 slots): banishment, fabricate, fire shield

attacks.name: Mercurial Longsword
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage.

special.name: Multitask
special.text: Tary makes two weapon attacks or casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action, and can also command Doty to use his Empowered Fist or Repair action.

Tary throws a bead of force up to 60 feet. Each creature within a 10-foot radius of where the bead landed must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 12 (5d4) force damage. A sphere of transparent force then encloses the area for 1 minute. A creature that fails the save and is completely within the area is trapped inside the sphere.

reactions.name: Brilliant Intellect
reactions.text: When Tary or another creature he can see within 30 feet of him makes an ability check or a saving throw, he can use his reaction to add +4 to the roll.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Tary is a 15th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following spells prepared:

multiAttack.text: The giant makes two Thundering Stone Club or Boulder attacks in any combination.

attacks.name: Thundering Stone Club
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. The giant can cause the club to emit a burst of thunderous energy that deals 10 (3d6) thunder damage to each creature, other than the giant, within 30 feet of the target. The club can emit a burst this way only once per turn.

attacks.name: Boulder
attacks.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition. After the giant throws the boulder, roll a d6; on a roll of 3 or lower, the giant has no more boulders to throw.

reactions.name: Unyielding
reactions.text: In response to failing a saving throw to avoid being moved, having the prone condition, or both, the giant succeeds instead.

resistances.condition: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the demon's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

multiAttack.text: The demon makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

attacks.name: Sting
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Aura of Protection
traits.text: The knight and each ally within 10 feet of it have advantage on saving throws. This trait is suppressed while the knight has the incapacitated condition.

multiAttack.text: The knight makes three Sunspear attacks.

attacks.name: Sunspear
attacks.text: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) radiant damage, or 21 (5d6 + 4) radiant damage if the target is a Fiend or an Undead.

special.name: Solar Flare
special.text: The knight unleashes a blaze of brilliant energy that fills a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the knight. Each creature of the knight's choice in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 (4d10) radiant damage and has the blinded condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. For the next minute, the affected area is filled with bright light that is sunlight.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The knight casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): 1/day each: Greater Restoration, Sending, Word of Recall (the prepared sanctuary is the Solar Bastion)

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The knight casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

1e: Word of Recall (the prepared sanctuary is the Solar Bastion)

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.text: When the bloodfin dies, it explodes in a cloud of toxic blood. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the exploding bloodfin, including any creature swallowed by the bloodfin, must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage. A creature inside the bloodfin when it explodes falls prone in the space formerly occupied by the bloodfin and is no longer blinded or restrained by it.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The bloodfin can breathe only underwater.

multiAttack.text: The bloodfin makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature missing any hit points), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the bloodfin can't bite another target.

attacks.name: Tail
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature missing any hit points), reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (4d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

bonusActions.name: Swallow
bonusActions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature the bloodfin is grappling. Hit: The bloodfin swallows the target. The swallowed creature is no longer grappled but is blinded and restrained. It has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the bloodfin, it takes 14 (4d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns, and the bloodfin regains hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt. A bloodfin can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

name: Skeleton Lord
languages: all the languages it knew in life

immunities.note: from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Fear Aura
traits.text: Any creature hostile to the skeleton lord that starts its turn within 20 feet of the skeleton lord must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw, unless the skeleton lord is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature has the frightened condition until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, then the creature is immune to the skeleton lord's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The skeleton lord has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The skeleton lord's weapon attacks are magical and gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls (included in the attack).

multiAttack.text: The skeleton lord makes three Greatsword attacks.

attacks.name: Greatsword
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.text: When the bloodfin dies, it explodes in a cloud of toxic blood. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the exploding bloodfin, including any creature swallowed by the bloodfin, must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage. A creature inside the bloodfin when it explodes falls prone in the space formerly occupied by the bloodfin and is no longer blinded or restrained by it.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The skeletal bloodfin requires no food, drink, air, or sleep.

multiAttack.text: The bloodfin makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature missing any hit points), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the bloodfin can't bite another target.

attacks.name: Tail
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature missing any hit points), reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (4d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

bonusActions.name: Swallow
bonusActions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature the bloodfin is grappling. Hit: The bloodfin swallows the target. The swallowed creature is no longer grappled but is blinded and restrained. It has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the bloodfin, it takes 14 (4d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns, and the bloodfin regains hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt. A bloodfin can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.text: The horror can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.text: While in dim light or darkness, the horror can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Shadow Stride
traits.text: As a bonus action, the horror can step into a shadow within 5 feet of it and magically appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of a second shadow that is up to 60 feet away. Both shadows must be cast by a Small or larger creature or object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

multiAttack.text: The horror makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the horror until the end of the target's next turn.

special.name: Lashing Shadows
special.text: Each creature within 60 feet of the horror, except other horrors, must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 27 (6d8) necrotic damage.

name: Shadow Assassin
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.text: The assassin can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.text: While in dim light or darkness, the assassin can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Weakness
traits.text: While in sunlight, the assassin has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

multiAttack.text: The assassin makes two Shadow Blade attacks.

attacks.name: Shadow Blade
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. Unless the target is immune to necrotic damage, the target's Strength score is reduced by 1d4 each time it is hit by this attack. The target dies if its Strength is reduced to 0. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a shadow (see the Monster Manual) rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

traits.name: Burden of Time
traits.text: Beasts and Humanoids (except elves) have disadvantage on saving throws while within 10 feet of the shadar-kai.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: The shadar-kai has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

multiAttack.text: The shadar-kai makes three Shadow Spear attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

attacks.name: Shadow Spear
attacks.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 26 (4d12) necrotic damage. Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the shadar-kai's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

special.name: Spellcasting
special.text: The shadar-kai casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16): At will: arcane eye, mage armor, minor illusion, prestidigitation, speak with dead 1/day each: arcane gate, bane, confusion, darkness, fear, major image, true seeing

reactions.name: Misty Escape
reactions.text: When the shadar-kai takes damage, it turns invisible and teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the start of its next turn or until it attacks or casts a spell.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The shadar-kai casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

traits.name: Rancid Degeneration
traits.text: At the end of each of the troll's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 11 (2d10) necrotic damage, unless the troll has taken acid or fire damage since the end of its last turn.

multiAttack.text: The troll makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

attacks.name: Claws
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Reduced Threat
traits.text: A reduced-threat monster takes a −2 penalty on attack rolls (included in the stat block), ability checks (included in the stat block for skill proficiencies), saving throws (included in the stat block for saving throw proficiencies), and saving throw DCs (included in the stat block).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The glabrezu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.text: The glabrezu's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14). The glabrezu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic 1/day each: confusion, fly, power word stun

multiAttack.text: The glabrezu makes four attacks: two with its pincers and two with its fists. Alternatively, it makes two attacks with its pincers and casts one spell.

attacks.name: Pincer
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 13). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple only one target.

attacks.name: Fist
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The glabrezu's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14). The glabrezu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

name: Reduced-Threat Clay Golem
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

immunities.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

traits.name: Reduced Threat
traits.text: A reduced-threat monster takes a −2 penalty on attack rolls (included in the stat block), ability checks (included in the stat block for skill proficiencies), saving throws (included in the stat block for saving throw proficiencies), and saving throw DCs (included in the stat block).

traits.name: Acid Absorption
traits.text: Whenever the golem is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

traits.name: Berserk
traits.text: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 60 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

multiAttack.text: The golem makes two slam attacks.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its hit point maximum to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

special.name: Haste
special.text: Until the end of its next turn, the golem magically gains a +2 bonus to its AC, has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and can use its slam attack as a bonus action.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.text: If the Slaughter Lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.text: While the Slaughter Lord is wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, its AC includes its Constitution modifier.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.text: The Slaughter Lord's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: thaumaturgy 3/day each: flame strike, spirit guardians 1/day each: control weather, divine word, fire storm

multiAttack.text: The Slaughter Lord makes four attacks with its dual greatswords or three attacks with its spear.

attacks.name: Dual Greatswords
attacks.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

attacks.name: Spear
attacks.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage, or 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage if used with both hands to make a melee attack.

bonusActions.name: Aggressive
bonusActions.text: The Slaughter Lord can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

actions.name: Attack
actions.text: The Slaughter Lord makes a spear or dual greatswords attack.

actions.name: Move
actions.text: The Slaughter Lord moves up to half its speed.

actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
actions.text: The Slaughter Lord casts an innate spell.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
